Text:
Please support INDEPENDENT ARTISTS and BUY this ALBUM. Do not DOWNLOAD please PEOPLE.

Amazon: http://www.amazon.co.uk/Soundtrack-to-the-Struggle-Explicit/dp/B005JN0ENQ/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1319645241&sr=8-1

iTunes:http://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/soundtrack-to-struggle.../id460445624

PEACE AND LOVE.

Don't worry, I'll be buying a proper copy of this album when I get payed. Just desperate for a sneak preview as I'm skint and proper impatient. 

Worth noting that you get superior quality from retail CDs (equivalent to FLAC). MP3s generally are lower quality, so if you like the music support this legendary artist if you can.

Cheers!

Amazing artist.

Speaks the truth just like the best, Tupac and Biggie.
